price: Say [O Prophet], “I only supplicate my Lord and I do not associate anyone with Him.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا
